title: Some JIT tests failed on Windows
body:
I installed LFortran using the instructions at docs.lfortran.org using MSVC. Things work, but I got the following failures:
```
(lf2) C:\Users\User\repos\lfortran\src\lfortran\tests\Release>test_lfortran
[doctest] doctest version is "2.4.8"
[doctest] run with "--help" for options
===============================================================================
C:\Users\User\repos\lfortran\src\lfortran\tests\test_llvm.cpp(973):
TEST CASE:  FortranEvaluator 10 trig functions

C:\Users\User\repos\lfortran\src\lfortran\tests\test_llvm.cpp(978): ERROR: CHECK( r.ok ) is NOT correct!
  values: CHECK( false )

C:\Users\User\repos\lfortran\src\lfortran\tests\test_llvm.cpp(979): ERROR: CHECK( r.result.type == FortranEvaluator::EvalResult::real4 ) is NOT correct!
  values: CHECK( 0 == 2 )

C:\Users\User\repos\lfortran\src\lfortran\tests\test_llvm.cpp(980): ERROR: CHECK( std::abs(r.result.f32 - 0.8414709848078965) < 1e-7 ) is NOT correct!
  values: CHECK( 303024.6585290152 <  0.0000001 )

C:\Users\User\repos\lfortran\src\lfortran\tests\test_llvm.cpp(982): ERROR: CHECK( r.ok ) is NOT correct!
  values: CHECK( false )

C:\Users\User\repos\lfortran\src\lfortran\tests\test_llvm.cpp(983): ERROR: CHECK( r.result.type == FortranEvaluator::EvalResult::real8 ) is NOT correct!
  values: CHECK( 0 == 3 )

C:\Users\User\repos\lfortran\src\lfortran\tests\test_llvm.cpp(984): ERROR: CHECK( std::abs(r.result.f64 - 0.8414709848078965) < 1e-14 ) is NOT correct!
  values: CHECK( 0.8414709848 <  0.0 )

C:\Users\User\repos\lfortran\src\lfortran\tests\test_llvm.cpp(986): ERROR: CHECK( r.ok ) is NOT correct!
  values: CHECK( false )

C:\Users\User\repos\lfortran\src\lfortran\tests\test_llvm.cpp(987): ERROR: CHECK( r.result.type == FortranEvaluator::EvalResult::real4 ) is NOT correct!
  values: CHECK( 0 == 2 )

C:\Users\User\repos\lfortran\src\lfortran\tests\test_llvm.cpp(988): ERROR: CHECK( std::abs(r.result.f32 - 0.5403023058681398) < 1e-7 ) is NOT correct!
  values: CHECK( 303024.9596976941 <  0.0000001 )

C:\Users\User\repos\lfortran\src\lfortran\tests\test_llvm.cpp(990): ERROR: CHECK( r.ok ) is NOT correct!
  values: CHECK( false )

C:\Users\User\repos\lfortran\src\lfortran\tests\test_llvm.cpp(991): ERROR: CHECK( r.result.type == FortranEvaluator::EvalResult::real8 ) is NOT correct!
  values: CHECK( 0 == 3 )

C:\Users\User\repos\lfortran\src\lfortran\tests\test_llvm.cpp(992): ERROR: CHECK( std::abs(r.result.f64 - 0.5403023058681398) < 1e-14 ) is NOT correct!
  values: CHECK( 0.5403023059 <  0.0 )

===============================================================================
[doctest] test cases:  83 |  82 passed |  1 failed | 0 skipped
[doctest] assertions: 607 | 595 passed | 12 failed |
[doctest] Status: FAILURE!
```
